title: Red Riding armor
summaries: The Red Riding armor is a ranger-oriented armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal] in total, after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Red Riding Hood, Red Riding Dress and Red Riding Leggings.
A full set of Red Riding armor will provide the following benefits:

• +48 defense
  • +25% ranged damage
  • +60% minion damage
  • +20% / +10% ranged critical strike chance
  • +20% ammo conservation
  • +20% movement speed
  • +3 extra sentry slots

Additionally, wearing the full set will greatly increase the fire rate of <linked>Explosive Trap</linked> sentries and will cause their attacks to inflict the <linked>Oiled</linked> debuff, making enemies take increased damage from <linked>On Fire!</linked>, <linked>Hellfire</linked>, <linked>Cursed Inferno</linked>, <linked>Frostburn</linked>, and <linked>Shadowflame</linked>.
The Red Riding armor set is a direct upgrade of the <linked>Huntress armor</linked> set.
